>
[Sneaky](/Feats.aspx?ID=5574) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=757" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 14 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Stealth is an important tool in your arsenal. You can move 5 feet farther when you take the [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=2405) action, up to your Speed. 

In addition, as long as you continue to use Sneak actions and succeed at your Stealth check, you don't become [observed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=84) if you don't have [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459) or greater cover and aren't [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) at the end of the Sneak action, as long as you have cover or greater cover or are concealed at the end of your turn.
